name: Wave Patterns #39
description: A harmonious composition of colorful intersecting wave patterns rendered in vibrant gradients against a deep blue background. The design features horizontal waves in blue, purple, magenta, pink, and gold, crossed by vertical undulating lines that create a rhythmic grid. White glowing nodes mark wave intersections with subtle circular halos in matching colors, while a central focal point radiates from the middle of the composition. The overall effect creates a sense of musical harmony and fluid movement through space.
